lead_paragraph: The Marlboro Man may not look so tough anymore, but investors shouldn’t write him off. Altria, which makes Marlboros, announced on Wednesday that it had shipped sharply fewer cigarettes in the third quarter than a year earlier. The looming health care reform, meanwhile, could further restrain smokers and manufacturers, Breakingviews.com writes.

headline.main: Are Cigarettes Now a Cigar-Butt Stock?
